de.polygonal.gl.DisplayListUtils

type
class
Helper methods for working with the flash display list.

Static Variables

attach(inline,null) : x : flash.display.DisplayObject -> parent : flash.display.DisplayObjectContainer -> Void

Adds x to the display list.

attachSibling(inline,null) : x : flash.display.DisplayObject -> y : flash.display.DisplayObject -> Void

Attaches y to the parent of x.

detach(inline,null) : x : flash.display.DisplayObject -> Void

Removes x from the display list.

detachAll(inline,null) : x : flash.display.DisplayObjectContainer -> Void

Removes x and all children of x from the display list.

detachChildren(inline,null) : x : flash.display.DisplayObjectContainer -> Void

Removes all children of x from the display list.

dump(default,method) : root : flash.display.DisplayObjectContainer -> ?depth : Int -> String

Prints out the display list tree.

nextFrame(inline,null) : mc : flash.display.MovieClip -> wrap : Bool -> Void

Moves the playhead of x to the next frame.

prevFrame(inline,null) : x : flash.display.MovieClip -> wrap : Bool -> Void

Moves the playhead of x to the previous frame.

replace(inline,null) : x : flash.display.DisplayObject -> other : flash.display.DisplayObject -> Void

Replaces x with other by attaching other to the parent of x and removing x from the display list.

toBack(inline,null) : x : flash.display.DisplayObject -> Void

Moves x to the background.

toFront(inline,null) : x : flash.display.DisplayObject -> Void

Moves x to the foreground.
